mapper.select: SELECT p.photo_id, l.lesson_id, l.titl lesson_titl, p.titl photo_titl, p.cdt, p.vw_cnt, f.photo_file_id, f.file_path FROM lms_photo p join lms_lesson l on p.lesson_id = l.lesson_id left outer join lms_photo_file f on p.photo_id = f.photo_id
